availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas "Tom" W. Bullock (Wealthy Scott County, KY farmer)

body.p: Residence: Scott County, Kentucky. A wealthy Kentucky-born farmer. Married Elizabeth. Father of M.B. Bullock.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, Entry for Thomas Bullock (died 1883), Find A Grave Memorial # 100558683, Lexington Cemetery, Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=bullock&GSfn=thomas&GSbyrel=all&GSdyrel=all&GSst=19&GScntry=4&GSob=n&GRid=100558683&df=all& (accessed 14 Aug 2017).
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District 2, p. 454.
